snippet.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Take a look at the 'Craft Your Playstyle' Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 trailer for the upcoming third-person action shooter developed by Saber Interactive. By completing missions and living to fight another day, points will be awarded to spend on customizing skills and load-outs to tailor towards a desired play style. Whether an offensive or defensive style is in order, or a specific colorway, the opportunities are endless in Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 launches on September 9 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#SpaceMarine2 #Warhammer #Gaming
